tool_description:
The MailBoxValidator Email Validation Web Service allows instant email address verification by using real time mail server connectivity and syntax checker.

Sign up for free license key at http://www.fraudlabs.com/freelicense.aspx?PackageID=9 which allows up to 90 queries a month.
name: MailBoxValidator
title: MailBoxValidator

api_list.name: MailBoxValidator API
